# Handouts for Each Attendee
##  04 March 2018

\newpage


```{r echo=FALSE, results="asis", warning=FALSE}
# results=asis: needed for the page breaking
# Read the source file
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(readxl)

servers <- as.data.frame(read_excel("C:/_gitHub/LinkedDataWorkshop/CSS2018/data/ClassInfo.xlsx", sheet = "Servers", col_names=TRUE))

## Loop
for (i in 1:nrow(servers)){
  cat("Handout for Attendee", i, "\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("IP Address: ", servers[i,2], "\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("Study: STUDY", i, "\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("First Person: PERSON", i,"-1\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("Second Person: PERSON", i, "-2\n")
  cat("\n\n")  
  cat("OPTIONAL: Additional People: PERSON",i,"-3, PERSON",i,"-4 ...PERSON",i,"-n\n")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n\\pagebreak\n")
      
}
